an5.240:3.1: piyo ca sobhano → ābhāvanīyo piyasobhanā ca (bj) | āvāsiko appiyasobhanā ca (s1-3)
an5.240:3.4: Macchariyā duvepi cāti → yathābhataṃ cādi tayo avaṇṇārahā duve macchariyā ca vuttā (bj) | catukkamaccherapañcakena cāti (si, s1-3) | catukkamacchariyena cāti (pts1) | catuko macchariyena cāti (mr)
